thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com
thread.title: Rashid Q.

author: Rashid Q.
title: Rashid Q.
text:
1000Bulbs is a great site with great prices. I have been able to find almost all the bulbs I need here and they have a great feature which automatically shows you all the comparable items to the bulb you are viewing with an easy-to-view side by side chart clearly listing all the stats and prices of all items that are similar to the one you are thinking about.
Orders are smooth, customer service is prompt and fulfillment and shipping are fast. Pretty much exactly what you want from a shopping experience. Makes this part of my job easy.
